# Education

```{r education}
tribble(
  # nolint start
  ~Degree, ~University, ~Date, ~Details,
  "Doctor of Philosophy", "Western Sydney University", 2016,
  "Thesis title: Investigating Associations Between Neighbourhood Green Space and Weight Status: A Longitudinal Study of Australian Children Aged 4 to 13 Years Old.",
  "Bachelor of Health Science (Honours; First Class)", "Western Sydney University", 2012,
  "Thesis title: Measuring adolescent boysâ€™ physical activity: Bout length and the influence of accelerometer epoch length.",
```

# Research Funding

```{r funding}
funding %>%
  mutate(
    Amount = gsub("$", "\\$", scales::dollar(Amount), fixed = TRUE),
    Scheme = if_else(
      !is.na(Scheme),
      stringr::str_c("--- ", Scheme),
      NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = glue("{Role} {Scheme} {Details}",
      "\\newline {Title}",
      .na = ""
    ),
    when = glue("{Start}--{Finish}"),
    with = Funder,
    where = Amount,
    .protect = FALSE
  )
```
